colorTheory.description: The color palette is a blend of high contrast text and background colors with a vibrant accent color for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette exudes clarity, professionalism, and a modern aesthetic.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures excellent readability and accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary text color and background color provide a strong foundation, while the accent color adds a pop of energy to the palette.
